lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in providing all the writing that a small business needs. I love to help new businesses get off the ground or expand by helping them find the voice of the owner – personal and authentic. It doesn’t take a committee to know who you are.

lenders.name: livingIF
lenders.loan_because: Kiva allows us to make a tangible difference in the world.  We believe everyone should have the opportunity to succeed and want to support people working to better the lives of them and their children.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I don't.  I once was an active member here that regularly made loans and helped spread the word about the good work Kiva does.  I also successfully invited three members to this site who are making loans and invitations of their own.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a gay man and an atheist who is incredibly disillusioned by Kiva's partnership with Strathmore University, which is a corporate venture by the Opus Dei.  Kiva was not transparent about and downplayed that connection when establishing their first round of Strathmore loans.  The feckless, inappropriate response by CEO Matt Flannery (which tried to transfer blame to the civility in the discussion forums here when LGBT and atheist members raised very valid concerns) was incredibly insulting and made the situation worse.  Also, the Catholic Church certainly has enough money in its coffers to provide opportunities for higher education to the people of Kenya free of charge without the need to partner with organizations who specialize in microlending to impoverished communities.

I am a strong believer in the power of education, but shame on me for buying into Kiva's marketing blitz about Strathmore and for not doing more research before making my loans.  I am no longer active here and am slowly withdrawing money from my account as my outstanding loans are repaid.  I still seek out opportunities to help others where I can, but I will not subject myself to bigoted, hateful organizations like the Catholic Church to do so.  Best of luck to all lenders and borrowers here.

lenders.loan_because: I love to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Wonderful!

lenders.name: Z.L. Thomas

lenders.name: julie & seth

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I love Kiva's mission

lenders.name: Christie

lenders.name: Kaitie

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Deanna
lenders.loan_because: I am ashamed that parts of the world are rich compared to parts of the world in poverty, and want to do my part to help people in a sustainable way.

lenders.name: jeffrey

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I admire those who want to help themselves.

lenders.name: Caro
lenders.loan_because: I can, it's great to feel that you can be of some help to people that are keen to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm Studio Manager for a Visual Communications company. We design all types of visual communications - ads, packaging, websites etc

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping entrepreneurs who do not have access to traditional capital markets.  I usually focus on loans to buy equipment or supplies for expanding the lenders' businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I recuit new employees for the company I work for.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: it can change someones life for the better... I have been blessed with so much and feel its my duty to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the director of a not-for-profit organisation that is trying to find solutions to poverty in Tanzania, I am also studying International Studies at Uni.

lenders.name: Davallia Bookclub
lenders.loan_because: We are aware we are fortunate to live in a country where we can speak our mind without fear of retribution and we know we are able to feed our families each day - unfortunately some other mothers throughout the world cannot  and we should all do what we can to rectify this.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: Just consider me a humanitarian...I enjoy helping those in need anyway that I can and this is a good cause...helping people around the world help themselves to improve their quality of life! :)

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: Blessings are meant to be shared with others. Give more, receive more.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I can and I believe in these micro loans.
lenders.occupational_info: Jazz singer.

lenders.name: Kym
lenders.loan_because: other people should be given the opportunity to get ahead
lenders.occupational_info: high school teacher

lenders.name: RICHARD & TERRI
lenders.loan_because: I think in Australia we live in a safe secure environment and receive good incomes we should therefore help out those less fortunate than ourselves

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can use small amounts of money to significantly help someone a world away.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large, urban public school helping to keep their computer networks working. I understand working with little money and old equipment, making do with what you have on hand.

lenders.loan_because: I think it's quiet easy: Act! Now! And don't wait for others to do the first step...

lenders.name: Vanish

lenders.occupational_info: Ancient Yoga blesses people emotionally, mentally and physically and I love teaching and sharing it.

lenders.name: Isaiah
lenders.loan_because: I care about the world and although many will say money doesnt buy happiness it does buy food and shelter. The Earth belongs to those who live on it!
lenders.occupational_info: In the United States we have food restaurants where you drive a vehicle up to a window and purchase something to eat, drink or both! I however am a carhop and what we do is instead of giving the food through a window we walk the food out to the buyers car! I meet many great people.

lenders.name: Floris
lenders.loan_because: Hoping to reduce poverty by stimulating entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are working hard to build their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses reduce their risk of loss by fire or other perils by providing insurance that will replace their property in case of loss.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I needed help and got it. Now I can afford to help the next person. Pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I ask wealthy people to give money to help organizations that need financial assistance. Americans are very generous.

lenders.name: Devi
lenders.loan_because: I love microfinance. I worked with a fantastic microfinance organization in India a few years ago, and want to stay involved in the movement while I focus on other things for a while.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies solve their biggest business problems and operate better.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: it is so easy to do and it helps out those that need a hand-up!

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: People around the world have good ideas on how to improve their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that invents medicines.  I visit doctors and explain how the medicines work and how to correctly use them.

lenders.name: Seamus
lenders.loan_because: I work a pretty bad job. It's pretty much the standard all other bad jobs are compared to. But even as bad as I think I have it, there are people in some of these countries that would kill to get a job with twice the workload and half the pay. So I figure, hey, why not help out? I don't feel I'm obligated to, or that someone who doesn't is a bad person, I just think it's a nice thing to do, yea?
lenders.occupational_info: I scrub the bathrooms, mop the floors, and pick up trash. Pretty exciting, isn't it?

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: I feel we must help each other in this life.  I can not be happy with  what I have earned or have been given if I can not share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for teens with emotional problems.  I try to help people feel hopeful and understand that we all have purpose.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I have been to Cambodia many times and am so grateful to be able to make a difference in people's lives there.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's exciting to see others provide for themselves and their families with my help.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, install and maintain network devices in hospitals to help doctors provide patient care.

lenders.name: Gian
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Social Media, Collaboration, Knowledge Management, Learning & Development

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because:
"We can let the circumstances of our lives harden us so that we become increasingly resentful and afraid, or we can let them soften us and make us kinder and more open to what scares us. We always have this choice." 
- Pema Chodron

lenders.name: Vivek
lenders.loan_because: I like to see empowerment in people's lives. I think its the right thing to do. I can afford it. These people want to work, they don't want to be on the dole. And finally, they want free trade not foreign aid. Availability of capital and credit to modernize and expand is the path to financial freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing liquidity by spreading the risk of mortgages from banks to pension funds, money managers, insurance companies and hedge funds.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I have just started, and I wanted to be helpful to someone in a country I have spent time in, so I picked Vietnam.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make movies and TV shows. I also take photographs.

lenders.name: Edward Bos
lenders.loan_because: Starting your own business is admirable, taking charge and responsibility of you own life. It's often difficult and should be supported all around the world. You starters have my respect!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping starting entrepreneurs with starting there business by coaching, motivate and advise them to start  the best way possible and to achieve realistic goals and continuity.

lenders.name: Yassir
lenders.loan_because: This is an extremely  powerful way to make a significant difference in the lives of poor people and to help them lift themselves out of poverty. A small investment by us,  will yield tremendous long-term returns to them.
lenders.occupational_info: Communications for an Int'l non-profit that is breeding crops that are richer in  nutrients(vitamin A, zinc, iron) to improve health of the poor. Also a web-writer. If you like plants check out my websites www.houseplantsnow.com or argusorchids.net

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: If we can, we should.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for money.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I am grateful for what I have, and want to be an entrepreneur myself one day.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to have so much and it takes so little to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I share nature with people from the city and help others do the same.

lenders.name: WesternBrother
lenders.loan_because: as a musical group, we have a platform that allows us to inform others about what is going on around the world, and the tangible ways these problems can be fixed. (i.e. Kiva).  We have been blessed by the Lord so we can now bless others with 100 percent of the money we make from this band.
lenders.occupational_info: We write music, we play concerts, we get money from playing concerts, from fans, and from selling merchandise.  100 percent of that money  is going to Kiva microloans.

lenders.name: Tomahawk Ranch
lenders.loan_because: God is great and all things belong to him. To see God's hand at work here is a delight.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise angora goats. They are sheared twice a year for their mohair fiber. Mohair is great for spinning, weaving, knitting & felting.

lenders.name: Reva
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful idea that works.  I have the opportunity of making a difference with a small amount of money.  By everyone else donating we can make such a tremendous impact together to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a law firm that deals with family law - separations, divorces, marriage contracts.  It is a very busy office and can be very stressful at times.   You need to have a sympathetic ear.

lenders.name: Peter C
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because:
“And the King will say, ‘I tell you the truth, when you did it to one of the least of these my brothers and sisters, you were doing it to me!’ (Matt 25:40)

I honor hard working individuals.

We were able to pay for my daughter's university education and I want to help youth that have to do it on their own.
lenders.occupational_info: Responsible to collect money  from clients who buy advertising on my company's TV stations.

lenders.name: Jette Andreassen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a different

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity to offer direct support to people so they can take charge of their own destinies, and help their families and communities.  Gives me some hope for the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a treatment program for people with gambling problems.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because:
it means somebody's life!
I desire to support the growth of women in business, especially in South/Central America.  I have traveled there several times and appreciate their dedication and hard work, not only in business but with their families.  I also speak a bit of Spanish.  
Of course, everyone will always need food, so you will see my lending trend is the grocery/food industry.
lenders.occupational_info: I make decisions to give loans to businesses in the United States.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I feel so fortunate that I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I buy rundown apartments and remodel them, then rent them out.

lenders.name: Ægir Þór
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly in microfinancing as a tool to fight poverty and improve quality of life

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Why not??

lenders.name: Jim and Penny

lenders.occupational_info: I work with people from all walks of life to help them with financial and insurance needs.

lenders.name: Jeanne-Marie
lenders.loan_because: a little here goes a long way there.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage finances for our family business and care for my 2 young children.

lenders.name: Therese
lenders.loan_because: it's an opportunity to help someone improve their quality of life by helping them help themselves.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is our responsibility to help others in need as the government will not. These people smile every day not knowing that they are less fortunate then many others yet we can complain daily over trivial things.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a single mother of 3 beautiful boys. I work for Anglicare. I am not well off but feel that i am well off to alot of these people, i live in a house with a fire and are clothed and fed each day which most of us take for granted. I want my 3 young children to grow up giving and helping others less fortunate.

lenders.name: Cameron & Jenny
lenders.loan_because: We have all we really need and want to help others reach that point.
lenders.occupational_info: We are currently working with schools in the New York City area.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: there are people in the world who, like me, are willing to work, but unlike me, are not as fortunat to have the funds for such a job

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Alice

lenders.name: Katrine
lenders.loan_because: There is only so much i need and there are people who need money more than i do
lenders.occupational_info: I just graduated from college and am working various jobs

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: there is nothing better than helping someone improve their current position. We take so much for granted in this country, including the easy access to low interest loans. Why not give someone the chance to expand their business and make their lives just a little easier?

lenders.name: Maya
lenders.loan_because: I want to help low-income individuals bridge the gap between poverty and empowerment.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I want to, I care, I can, I should, it's important, I owe something to everyone, kharma
lenders.occupational_info: I help students enroll in college

lenders.name: Isobel
lenders.occupational_info: I work admin at the moment-sitting behind a desk. Bu have been a chef and lots of other things

lenders.name: Yoshihisa
lenders.loan_because:
I would like to change the agriculture field.
My mission is that 
to organize the world's information of food and agriculture and make it universally  usable and no world of starvation.
lenders.occupational_info: Managing a company to organize the infomation of agriculture in Japan, and make an EC site to sell the vegitables and fruites.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.occupational_info: I get people youtube views for their videos.

lenders.name: Jeff Green
lenders.loan_because: I wish to do my part in helping others help themselves.  If each person gave according to their ability, we could change the world.  The gifts we give to others need not be monetary.  Maybe all you can give away today is an uncertain, but well defined smile.  Give that.  Tomorrow, maybe you'll give away hugs.  In no time at all, you'll be slinging bling-bling to unsuspecting passersby in a developing nation.  (Be sure to maintain a genuine sense of charity that doesn't involve too much of your ego. Give because you know in your heart that improves happiness for everyone, not just yourself.)  So we each should give, no matter what, according to our abilities.  Consider this, if a rich man gave you a plate of tomatoes from his royal gardens, and then a poor man offered you a plate of tomatoes he grew with his own hands, and tomatoes were not so plentiful this year due to rains.  Who gave you the most meaningful gift, the Nobleman or the Poor man?  Same tomatoes...could it be that one of the gifts had tremendously greater value than the other?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the State of Oklahoma helping to ensure that our water supply is clean and readily available for use tomorrow and also many years down the road.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: It will help others
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a business student at a large university

lenders.name: Amit
lenders.loan_because: I can............Giving someone an opportunity is better than charity
lenders.occupational_info: Fighting the MAN!!!

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I have a desire to make the world a better place and to help women achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a clerical worker for 40 years.  I recently retired and now enjoy doing volunteer work and growing vegetables for our meals.

lenders.name: shane
lenders.loan_because: to give someone a go

lenders.name: The Butler Five
lenders.loan_because: We loan becuase we admire the determined entrepreneurs across the globe.

lenders.name: Anne VK
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women achieve their business goals so they can provide for their families.

lenders.name: Ruben
lenders.loan_because: I believe every action, no matter how modest, can make a big difference.

lenders.name: Olivier
lenders.loan_because: My needs personal needs are satisfied, all i am left with are 'wants' so try and fulfill others essential needs, by giving them the gift of opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I wash dishes for money, superficially a pretty unimportant job, but with the money earned from it, i gain satisfaction with the thought that i can help others,

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for all that I have and I want to help empower working women in other countries so they and their children can have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to stories of people's lives and turn them into movies that will inspire and educate many other people.

lenders.loan_because: It simply  feels good to do something that furthers peoples lives.

lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: We are ONE!

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the computer software industry.

lenders.loan_because: I've seen and experienced the hardships of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to walk quickly and muse on life's quirks and perks

lenders.name: Eirik
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: My parents are teaching me how lucky I am to have so many toys.  I save up my pocket money and give some away to people who don't have as many things as me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am kinder.

lenders.name: Fabienne
lenders.loan_because: I'm 15 years old, and I've watched people let others struggle all my life, which has't been very long. It tears my heart out to see people in need, and people who have the ability to give just walk right by like they've seen nothing. It's time for me to give back to the world, I wan't to help, I wan't to be a part of team KIVA, erasing poverty one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend an Art school for dance and poetry.

lenders.name: Sabine
lenders.loan_because: It was a birthday gift from a friend and this is a real good thing!  Much better than stuff I don't need and may be it will be a little piece of help for people who are fighting for surviving.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am reporting about KAIZEN. This means continous improvement in companies. 
I am sure KIVA will help to improve the situation of people all over the world.

lenders.name: Carl-Johan
lenders.loan_because: It feels good!
